column1: #Text=This will be a homing pigeon story .
#Text=Though I send it ever so far -- though its destination be the office of a home-and-fireside magazine or one of the kind with a French story in the back , it will return to me .

#Text=After each flight its feathers will be a little more rumpled , its wings more weary , its course more wavering , until , battered , spent , broken , it will flutter to rest in the waste basket .
#Text=And yet , though its message may never be delivered , it must be sent , because -- well , because -- --
#Text=You know where the car turns at Eighteenth ?
#Text=There you see a glaringly attractive billboard poster .
#Text=It depicts groups of smiling , white-clad men standing on tropical shores , with waving palms overhead , and a glimpse of blue sea in the distance .
#Text=The wording beneath the picture runs something like this :

#Text=Our paper had it that  Edwin Houghton had accepted a position as clerk and assistant chemist at the Kunz drugstore , where he would take up his new duties Monday .

column1: #Text=The man-size job loomed up before Eddie 's dazzled eyes when he least expected it .
#Text=It was at the close of a particularly hot day when it seemed to Eddie that every one in town had had everything from birch beer to peach ice cream .
#Text=On his way home to supper he stopped at the postoffice with a handful of letters that old man Kunz had given him to mail .
#Text=His mother had told him that they would have corn out of their own garden for supper that night , and Eddie was in something of a hurry .
#Text=He and his mother were great pals .
